patterns: How do I start a school or institution to educate children
How can I start my own school
I want to educate the children of my area
i want to start a school
I want to make a school
How to build a school for my area ?
responses:
Hey! That's a great initiative. There are a few things you need to do to accomplish that.

1. Find out full information and statistics about the no. of children in your area, the area of land you possess, etc.

2. Make a basic blueprint of your business plans, location, faculty, teaching subjects, curriculum etc.

3. Develop a budget and figure out how much funding you require 

4. Use our app's awesome sponsor finder portal to connect with sponsors and receive the funding accordingly

5. Contact your area's Department of Education and discuss your plans with them for approval

6. Plan promotional strategies to have children enrolled in your school

7. Educate the future pioneers of your country!

patterns: Does my institute need to pay taxes
responses: Public schools in the United States of America provide basic education from kindergarten until the twelfth grade. This is provided free of charge for the students and parents, but is paid for by taxes on property owners as well as general taxes collected by the federal government. This education is mandated by the states. With the completion of this basic schooling, one obtains a high school diploma as certification of basic skills for employers.

patterns: can I even lawfully start my own school
is it even legal to start my own school
What are the laws for starting my own school
What are the rules for starting my own school
is it illegal to start a school
Is it legal to start a school ?
responses:
There are different laws for starting education institutes in every country.  Please contact your country's Ministry of Education to get more details on this.

However, in the United States,Department of Education does not regulate the private school establishment process, and you do not need any approval from the federal government to get started.

patterns: How profitable is starting a school
Is starting a school a good business?
responses:
Opening a good, new school is a huge challenge. It is complicated under the best of circumstances. It involves business plans, construction, financing, logistics, innovative business ideas and marketing â€“ many tasks outside the experience of even veteran educators

However, it can turn out to be very profitable if you plan it well
